{{Wireless embedded system |brand=QNAP |model=QBoat |revision=Sunny |asin=B078BGWRCM |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |est_release_date=08/16/2017 |fcc_date= |fcc_id=2ACFN |type=single-board computer, IoT board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL-314 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (NGFF), USB 3.1, mSATA, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (NGFF) |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8033 |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035 |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035 |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1; ,,, Programmable Logic IC;Weltrend;WT61P803;;1; ,,, Multi-Voltage Translator;TI;LSF0108;;2; ,,, USB 2.0 Audio Chip;C-Media;CM6533;;1; ,,, |flags=Audio in/out, Mic (3.5mm), I2C, UART, SPI, SDIO, GPIO, Console (3.5mm), RTC battery, |stock_boot= |stock_os=QTS Lite |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Single-board IoT Mini Server}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.qnap.com/en/product/qboat%20sunny}} {{•}} [https://www.qnap.com/en/product/qboat%20sunny/specs/hardware Spec.]
{{See also|Annapurna Labs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL-314 :Quad Core (ARM Cortex-A15) @1.7GHz *Flash: 512MB (NAND), RAM: 2GB (DDR3) *Network: WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 2x GbE (RJ45) *Mini PCIe: 1x M.2 2230 Key A (Wi-Fi/BT) *mSATA: 2x M.2 2260/2280 Key M (SSD RAID1) *USB: 2x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Type A) *Inrerface: Audio in/out, Mic (3.5mm), :I2C, UART, SPI, SDIO, GPIO (40-pin), :Console (3.5mm), RTC battery, LEDs *Power: 12V/3A; Size: 144x126x33.5 mm
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/12/18/qnap-qboat-sunny-review-part-1-unboxing-closer-look-and-initial-setup/ On '''CNX-Software''']
===News=== *[https://www.qnap.com/en/news/2017/ces-2017-qnap-unveils-thunderbolt-3-nas-qiot-suite-and-qts-iot-server-4k-live-stream-broadcasts-and-more-nas-solutions On '''QNAP'''] *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/11076/qnap-at-ces-2017-thunderbolt-3-and-xeon-d-nas-units-residential-gateways-and-more On '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/01/08/qnap-qboat-sunny-development-board/ On '''CNX-Software''']
===See also=== *'''[[QNAP QHora-301W]]''' (AX3600) • [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-qnap-qhora-301w/96934 Spec] • [https://www.qnap.com/en/product/qhora-301w PPage] :''Wi-Fi 6 Dual-port 10GbE SD-WAN Router'' :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A @2.2GHz ::Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) ''Hawkeye2'' :*Flash: 4GB NAND (eMMC); RAM: 1GB (DDR3) <!-- ::8MB [[Winbond]] W25Q64DW (SPI) • AP-HK01-C1 --> :*Switch: QCA8075 (5-port) + [[Aquantia]] AQR113C ::4x 1GbE (WAN/LAN), 2x 10GbE (WAN/LAN) RJ-45 ports :*USB: 2x USB 3.2 (Gen 1) ports • 12v/3.33A • [https://dongknows.com/qnap-qhora-301w-ax3600-sd-wan-wi-fi-6-router-review/ Review] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFN-HORA301W 2ACFN-HORA301W] (10/15/2020) • B08MQT9ZCX
*'''[[QNAP QMiro-201W]]''' - Tri-Band Mesh WiFi Satellite :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019/QCA9886/QCA8075 (SW) :*Flash: [[Toshiba]] (eMMC), RAM: Micron (D9SHD) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFN-QMIRO201W 2ACFN-QMIRO201W] (09/29/2020) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFN-QMIROP201W 2ACFN-QMIROP201W] (09/25/2020)
*'''[[QNAP QWA-AC2600]]''' - AC2600 Wireless PCIe Adapter :2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984; ASM1182e :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFN-QWAAC2600 2ACFN-QWAAC2600] (06/12/2018)
*'''[[QNAP QLivebox]]''' - QNAP QLive Box NAS :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFN-QLIVEBOX 2ACFN-QLIVEBOX] (06/25/2015)
*'''[[QNAP QGenie]]''' - QNAP QGenie Mobile NAS :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/2ACFNQG-103N/ 2ACFNQG-103N] (06/18/2014)
